channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> A guide to robotics Limbs - Driving Actions Quite often, robots are designed in our own image. Most robots, therefore, perform physical actions such as moving around, emitting sounds or lights, etc. To drive these actions, your robot might require one or more (or none at all) of these components, depending on the desired function. These ’limbs’ can work independently or in conjunction to perform any desired action.
